meta.label: Synchronize Azure AD users with DSS
meta.description: Manage DSS users based on membership of AAD groups

params.name: flag_simulate
params.label: Simulate
params.description: Do not execute, only log which actions would be taken

params.name: user_mapping
params.label: User mapping
params.description: In a regexp, use '()' to capture a substring. In a replacement string, use '{0}' to retrieve a captured substring.

params.name: groups_dataset
params.label: Groups dataset
params.description: A dataset containing the list of AAD groups. It should contain these columns: dss_group_name, aad_group_name, dss_profile.

params.name: log_dataset
params.label: Save logging into
params.description: Optionally save the logging into this dataset

params.name: login_remapping
params.label: Login remapping
params.description: Replace characters in DSS user logins
